MeasurementToolMetadata.Name: BrainSwipes Results for Quality Control Performed on XCP-D Functional Resting State Derivatives (Surface Reconstruction Method in Infant fMRIPrep: T1w-based Infant FreeSurfer)

img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.Description: Age (in years) of the candidate at the time of the first acquired scan

img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.name: img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c88a_bold_summary_QC
img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.Description: Summary QC score for functional registration to T1w: average of scores across all T1w visual reports (columns ending with *_mean) where a score of 0=Fail and 1=Pass
img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.table_label: Quality Control - Manual - Post-processing - XCP-D - Resting State fMRI

img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.name: img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c88a_bold_summary_nrev
img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.Description: Average number of reviewers across all T1w visual reports (T1w columns ending with *_nrev)
img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.table_label: Quality Control - Manual - Post-processing - XCP-D - Resting State fMRI

img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.name: img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c88a_bold_T1wOnTask_mean
img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.Description: Mean QC score for functional registration (overlay of subject's T1w onto BOLD). Derived from average scores of 0 (Fail) and 1 (Pass) (or NA if QC was not performed)
img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.table_label: Quality Control - Manual - Post-processing - XCP-D - Resting State fMRI

img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.Description: Number of reviewers for functional registration (overlay of subject's T1w onto BOLD)

img_brainswipes_xcpd_hash-2afa9081+0ef9c.Description: Mean QC score for functional registration (overlay of subject's BOLD onto T1w). Derived from average scores of 0 (Fail) and 1 (Pass) (or NA if QC was not performed)
